OOC: Thanks Zardus

:::Wheeljack/Ratchet/Torca:::

Wheeljack: I think we can modify some missles to create torpedos from the 
storage.
::He starts walking to the storage area, motioning for Composer to follow::
~~~~~
::Torca gets hit by some of the lasers.  he fires 2 charges at the shuttle::
~~~~~
::Ratchet gets hit by a few laser shots, and fires 15 shots from each gun and 
2 tusk missles at the shuttle::


--part1_33.107a2aaf.27b5a756_boundary
